beer.beer_description:
Known as Jamaica's best-kept secret, Dragon Stout is a perfect blend of Pilsner & roasted malt, sugar, hops, water and caramel coloring. Enjoyed since 1920, Dragon Stout continues to hold its own in the market as a Jamaican favorite.

Ingredients:
Water, Malted Barley, Barley, Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Color: Ammonia Caramel, Hop Extract, Carbon Dioxide

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 55 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 12!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 80 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 17!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 105 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 22!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 5 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 45 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 10!

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 105 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 22!

user.bio: Hoptimist…everyrhing is better with a good craft beer!

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 500 checkins with the serving style of Taster. You have reached the top!! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 385 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 78!

When the rum is all gone, pick up some Caribbean beer instead. Each island region has it’s own unique style and popular brew, perfect for relaxing on a tropical beach. Try 5 different beers from a brewery that is located in Caribbean (Antigua and Barbuda, Aruba, Bahamas, Barbados, Bermuda, British Virgin Islands, Cayman Islands, Cuba, Curacao, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Grenada, Haiti, Jamaica, Puerto Rico, Saint Kitts and Nevis, St. Lucia, St. Vincent & the Grenadines, Sint Maarten, Trinidad and Tobago, Turks and Caicos Islands, or United States Virgin Islands). Try 5 more for Level 2!
